participant_1.name: Aarav Patel
participant_1.personality: Energetic and passionate about swimming, Aarav has a unique blend of traditional and modern values that shapes his worldview.
participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

participant_2.name: Sophia Chen
participant_2.personality: Sophia is ambitious and fashion-conscious, often driven by her aspirations despite the lack of support from her family.
participant_2.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family doesn't support my career choices.
